entry.title: SPECIAL WEATHER STATEMENT , Vanier
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 11:19 PM EST Tuesday 10 January 2023

entry.title: Tuesday night: A few clouds. Low minus 19.
entry.summary: A few clouds. Wind southwest 20 km/h becoming light early this evening. Low minus 19. Wind chill minus 13 this evening and minus 22 overnight. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EST Tuesday 10 January 2023

entry.title: Wednesday: Mainly sunny. High minus 11.
entry.summary: Mainly sunny. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 11. Wind chill minus 23 in the morning and minus 14 in the afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EST Tuesday 10 January 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: Partly cloudy. Low minus 16 with temperature rising to minus 10 by morning.
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. Wind becoming east 20 km/h before morning. Low minus 16 with temperature rising to minus 10 by morning. Wind chill minus 24 in the evening and minus 18 overnight. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EST Tuesday 10 January 2023
